bug.short_desc: Problem with Selection/Disabled ListItems in Virtual List

long_desc.thetext:
I believe there's a problem with Disabled ListItems not being consistently selected programatically.
The playground example above demonstrates the problem, I believe. After a few seconds all the items are disabled and selected, yet when you scroll up/down you'll see some blocks are not selected.
In the application that I'm working on I have a few disabled items, and it's important that they are displayed selected or unselected. However, most of the time they aren't being shown selected.
[I've done a bit of troubleshooting, and the items are being immediately being removed from the selection array by a listener by the looks of it]
Thanks!
